long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPTools contains enhancements for the ChatGPT interface.

Current features:
- Recall: By pressing the Up Arrow while in the bottom textarea, your last message will be inserted into it

More features will be added in the future. Stay tuned!
